body.contents: Before you can start your new and tweaked Minecraft journey with Scale Leveling you need to make yourself a character.
The proccess is short and requires you to choose a starting class and a starting item.
After that you are set! To level up you character while playing, press [G] or your "Quick Actions" button.
Also remember to check out the Scale Leveling Config from the pause menu. There you can set a new advanced keep inventory rule, change difficulties beyond vanilla and try beating challenges.
